constructor.details: the controller implementation can be extended but must implement the minimum interface

periodic().details: Acceptable access control will vary by implementation.

constructor.notice: this controller implementation supports the interface but does not intervene in any way

init().notice: OneTokenBase (msg.sender) calls this when the controller is assigned. Must be re-initializeable.

periodic().notice: oneTokens invoke periodic() to trigger periodic processes. Can be trigger externally.
